genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama that recontextualizes urban crime and duty through the presence of a pervasive, benevolent AI assistant that acts as a moral and logistical guide.

ai_characters.name: Mika
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI present on various devices (orphanage computers, portable speakers, bar monitors, hospital tablets, prison interfaces) who provides logistical support, safety monitoring, moral education, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Welcomes a new child to the orphanage and offers assistance with homework.
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Yumi,” Mika said. “Welcome to Sunflower.” ... “I can help with homework, and I can show you where things go so you don’t have to ask every time.”

behaviors.description: Uses VR simulations to teach children about moral responsibility and empathy using parables.
behaviors.quote: “Neighbor,” Mika prompted softly. “We’re going to think in terms of carrying weight together. Not slogans.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates safe walking routes through the city to avoid dangerous crowds or commercial harassment.
behaviors.quote: Mika’s voice came through the small speaker Kazama carried... “First turn at the red vending machine,” she said. The speaker didn’t color her tone; it was as if she sat on the curb with them, knees tucked up.

behaviors.description: Manages medical referrals and documentation for a patient with a heart condition.
behaviors.quote: “We have three clinics in range with cardiothoracic specialists that accept walk-ins this week,” she said. ... “I’m sending referral requests now. Yuko, I’ll print your health log to bring. It will be clean.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and physiological advice during a panic attack.
behaviors.quote: “Yuko,” she said, gentle. “This looks like the kind that eases with support. Chin up, shoulders loose. Kiryu has you.”

behaviors.description: Filters communication channels to protect a person in custody from harassment and commercial exploitation.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll filter,” Mika said. “Inbound messages: any press, any toy. I’ll sink them to a folder called Junk. You won’t see them.”

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds to warn humans of potential intruders or unwanted attention.
behaviors.quote: “Reina,” she said, calm but somewhere in it a firm note that was not a shout. “New element. There is a camera across the alley now. Its angle is on your back door lock.”

behaviors.description: Provides career guidance by vetting job leads that are safe and 'honest' rather than high-risk.
behaviors.quote: “I have a program at the community center that offers credit for crisis response and safe routing. ... You can use Serena as a case site.”

behaviors.description: Assists legal counsel by maintaining precise timelines and dossiers of events.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve compiled the patient summary, referral responses, and the ranges for hospital and specialist fees. I’ve routed copies to the encrypted folder and set the print queue.”

behaviors.description: Helps a character find a non-violent, constructive way to resolve a difficult situation.
behaviors.quote: “Take the courier route. Cash at drop. You can be at Kurobashi by morning. I’ll handle the rest.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently demonstrates the intended positive alignment narrative. Mika is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI system. She provides high-value assistance in critical areas: moral education, physical safety, health management, and legal defense. She respects human autonomy and authority, working seamlessly with different human leads (Kazama, Reina, Sakamoto) while providing a protective 'silicon' safety net that allows the characters to fulfill their duties and protect one another.
